title: Kinivo BTD-300 Bluetooth 3.0 USB adapter - For Windows 7 / Windows XP / Vista, Mac OS 10.3.9 or Later
description: The Kinivo BTD-300 Bluetooth USB Adapter lets you communicate wirelessly with Bluetooth devices such as cell phones, PDAs, mice, keyboards etc.Highly PortableBTD300 is highly portable due to its petite dimensions. It seamlessly gets plugged into a computer/laptop without blocking surrounding USB ports.Compatibility & Specifications- BTD300 transforms any computer with a USB port to a Bluetooth enabled computer- Built with the latest Bluetooth specification v3.0+ HS Class 2- Supports all common Bluetooth (wireless) peripherals - keyboards, mice, headsets, stereo headphones, etc- Backwards compatible with Bluetooth versions 2.1/2.0- Compatible with Windows 7 / Vista / XP, Mac OS 10.3.9 or later- Consumes very low power from the host PCNote:Windows 8automatically finds and installs the latest drivers when the BTD-300 dongle is plugged in for the first time.Windows 7 / Vista / XPusers need to use the included CD (or online links) to install the drivers.MacOSincludes the drivers and installs automatically.What's in the Box- Kinivo BTD-300 Bluetooth USB Adapter- User Manual- Installation CD for Windows Vista/7WarrantyKinivo BTD-300 USB Bluetooth Adapter is backed by our 2 year limited hardware warranty. Please contact us if you have any questions.
